description: This PHP script is an action handler for wireless network configuration. It manages WiFi settings, including enabling/disabling radios, SSID configurations, WPS functions, MAC filtering, and band steering parameters. It performs validation, updates device settings via system calls, and returns JSON responses for certain actions.

methods.name: validChecksum
methods.description: Validates WPS PIN checksum with either 4 or 8 digit numerical PIN.

methods.name: validFilterParam
methods.description: Validates filter parameters ensuring device names contain printable characters and MAC addresses are valid.

methods.name: MiniApplySSID
methods.description: Applies changes to a specific SSID by setting corresponding device configuration parameters.
